# Amalgamation
---
#noun
- **The process of [[a/_amalgamating|amalgamating]]; a mixture, merger or [[c/_consolidation|consolidation]].**
- **The result of [[a/_amalgamating|amalgamating]]; a mixture or [[a/_alloy|alloy]].**
- **The intermarriage and interbreeding of [[d/_different|different]] ethnicities or races.**
---
